content: शुध् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (शुध्यति, शुद्ध) {@--1@} To become pure or purified; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); मृतोयैः शुध्यते शोध्यं नदी वेगेन शुध्यति . अद्भिर्गात्राणि शुध्यंति मनः सत्येन शुध्यति <ls>Ms. 5. 108-9</ls>. {@--2@} To be auspicious, favourable, or eligible; तिथिरेव तावन्न शुध्यति <ls>Mu. 5.</ls> {@--3@} To be made clear, have the doubts removed; न शुध्यति मेंऽतरात्मा <ls>Mk. 8.</ls> {@--4@} To be defrayed or cleared; व्ययः शुध्यति <ls>Pt. 5.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (शोधयति-ते) {@--1@} To purify, cleanse, wash off. {@--2@} To clear, pay off (as a debt). {@--3@} To refine, filter. {@--4@} To correct. {@--5@} To acquit. {@--6@} To examine, investigate, inquire into. --WITH परि, --वि, सं to be purified; <ls>R. 12. 104</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 64.</ls>
